title: Project 01
description: An e-commerce platform specializing in the retail of readymade garments, leveraging a stocklot inventory model.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented comprehensive test strategies for the e-commerce platform
Conducted usability testing and gathered user feedback
Implemented automated testing suite using Cypress
Optimized checkout flow reducing cart abandonment by 25%

title: Project 02
description: International Trade Insights platform analyzing global trade profiles through shipment records.
responsibilities: Led end-to-end testing strategy for complex data visualization features
Conducted user research and usability studies for dashboard design
Implemented automated API testing framework
Created user journey maps and interaction patterns
Reduced system response time by 40% through performance testing

title: Project 03
description: Comprehensive platform for Monitoring, Evaluation, Research & Learning with focus on data visualization.
responsibilities: Developed automated test scripts for complex data visualization components
Designed intuitive dashboards and report interfaces
Implemented accessibility testing protocols
Created style guide and component library
Reduced bug report time by 60% through streamlined processes

title: Project 04
description: Innovative eLearning Management System focused on streamlining education and empowering learners.
responsibilities: Architected the platform's user experience strategy
Implemented comprehensive testing framework for learning modules
Designed adaptive learning interfaces
Led usability testing sessions with educators and students
Improved learning completion rates by 35% through UX improvements

title: Project 05
description: Modern Human Resource Management System (HRMS) with focus on employee management, attendance tracking, and intuitive user experience.
responsibilities: Conducted extensive user interviews with HR professionals to understand workflow requirements
Created user personas and journey maps for different HR roles (HR Manager, Admin, Employee)
Developed information architecture and user flows for complex HR processes
Designed wireframes and interactive prototypes for key features including employee onboarding
keyFeatures: Conducted extensive user interviews with HR professionals to understand workflow requirements
Employee list view with quick action buttons

title: Project 06
description: Modern website design for a software development company featuring dark mode aesthetics, abstract technological elements, and intuitive navigation system.
responsibilities: Designed modern dark-themed interface with technology-focused visual elements
Developed comprehensive design system including typography, color palette, and spacing rules
Conducted competitive analysis to identify best practices
keyFeatures: Dark mode aesthetic with teal accents

title: Project 07
description: A premium real estate platform designed to showcase luxury properties with an elegant, modern interface focused on visual storytelling and seamless property exploration.
responsibilities: Conducted user research and competitive analysis of real estate platforms
Created user flows and wireframes for property search and inquiry processes
Designed modern UI components including property cards, sliders, and detail pages
Implemented responsive design ensuring optimal viewing across all devices
keyFeatures: Modern hero section with property slider
Property cards with price and details
About Us section with vision and mission
Footer with company information and contacts
